title: (x) Cool sans-serif used in NYTimes ad - Chalet {D Riley}
content:
I know I’ve seen this before, but I can’t seem to place it.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015160654/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_45.png) | 4.42 KB |

 [‹ (x) Drytransfer "Bureau voor Sociotechniek" serif face - Belwe {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015160654/http:/typophile.com/node/28196 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Frankie says relax t-shirt - Arial {Richard Hards} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015160654/http:/typophile.com/node/28197 "Go to next forum topic")
author: eston

comments.content: Looks like Chalet from House Industries.

I agree. More specifically it looks like [Chalet 80 in the London weight](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015160654/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts).

- Mike Yanega
